description: Pool chemical supply in Petawawa to Government of Canada
tags: PSPC- Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
**TITLE**
Government of Canada Tender Notice
**REFERENCE NUMBER**
WS4643015209
**TENDER CLOSING DATE**
July 9, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

**PURPOSE**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Minister of National Defence (MND) invites qualified Offerors to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) process to supply and deliver pool chemicals and water filtration products to the Real Property Operations Unit (RPOU) Detachment Petawawa.

**PROPOSED PROCUREMENT**

- **Commodity Service Category:** Pool chemicals and water filtration products
- **UNSPSC Code:** 47121815, 49241700
- **Description:** Supply and delivery of pool chemicals and water filtration products to the RPOU Detachment Petawawa

**TENDER PROCESS**
The RFSO process will follow the requirements outlined in the solicitation document available on the Ariba Discovery portal.

**SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS**
- Submit all required supporting documentation and the bid proposal on or before July 9, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EDT
- Please disregard the original response deadline posted on the Ariba Discovery portal

**IMPORTANT DEADLINE**
Any bids submitted after 2:00 p.m. EDT on July 9, 2024, will be considered non-responsive.

**RESPONSIBLE AUTHORITY**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is the responsible authority for this procurement.

**APPLICATION**
Please submit your response electronically to the Ariba Discovery portal and adhere to the following address information:

**APPENDICES**
Appendices available upon request.
**Documentation Required**
Bidder’s workshops and seminars report
Complete and entire bid, proposal, and any additional separate documents as stated in the solicitation document.

**WHO MAY APPLY**
Any business or company capable of delivering the required goods to the desired quality and specifications.

**AVAILABLE TRADE AGREEMENTS**

This posting is open to tender under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and several international trade agreements the Government of Canada is a signatory to, including:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
